common_weapons.name: Basic Sword
common_weapons.description: A classic melee weapon, used to slash and stab enemies.

common_weapons.name: Basic Bow
common_weapons.description: A ranged weapon that uses arrows to deal damage to enemies from a distance.

common_weapons.name: Basic Dagger
common_weapons.description: A small, agile weapon that can be used for quick attacks or stealthy assassinations.

common_weapons.name: Basic Axe
common_weapons.description: A heavy, two-handed weapon that deals crushing blows to enemies.

common_weapons.name: Basic Mace
common_weapons.description: A blunt weapon that can be used to crush armor and bones.

common_weapons.name: Basic Staff
common_weapons.description: A versatile weapon that can be used for melee attacks or to cast spells.

common_weapons.name: Basic Spear
common_weapons.description: A long, pointed weapon that can be used for thrusting attacks or to keep enemies at a distance.

common_weapons.name: Basic Wand
common_weapons.description: A magical weapon that can be used to cast spells or empower allies.

common_weapons.name: Basic Hammer
common_weapons.description: A heavy weapon that deals crushing blows to enemies and can also be used to smash obstacles.

common_weapons.name: Basic Whip
common_weapons.description: A flexible weapon that can be used to trip or disarm enemies, or to reach items that are out of reach.
